channel.title: How do i join someone else's server?
channel.description:
EDIT: Wrong place sorry
Sorry im new...when i start up moparscape i can only start a new server or enter ( enters me into a new server ) and i wanna join other ppls
Please help

item.title: How do i join someone else's server?
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

OK, look at the top of your MoparScape screen, click ‘Help’

Then, click ‘Server Status’

Then, pick a server.

Copy the Server IP into MoparScape(file>New Server>CTRL+V)

Then, copy the port number into MoparScape(file>[i]New Port>CTRL+V[/i]) then click OK.

Then, make a new account or log into an existing account.

EDIT: If you have any trouble with doing that, which you shouldn’t, let me know!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i join someone else's server?
